IBM Cloud Innovation Tour
 
 
 
In the technology industry, attending conferences and events is beneficiary and boosting to every enterprise. IBM Cloud Innovation Tour is the largest cloud event that offers a vast experience on the benefits of cloud and the latest technologies that accelerate Cloud Innovation. Team Miracle is looking forward to be there in the next few weeks to guide you on cloud related aspects.

Messaging is on a ROLL!!
 
 
 
Want to explore a new way to simplify your messaging capabilities besides learning, networking, taking part in a high-tech golfing range, or even enjoying the scenic beauty of Kalahari Resorts? Then, MQ Appliance Event aka A TopGolf Event, and MQ Technical Conference aka the largest IBM MQ conference are just for you. Meet us at both the events for expert sessions and demos on MQ Light On Prem/Cloud/Bluemix.

Customer Success Story
 
 
 
Miracle, a Premier Business Partner of IBM, helped the customer with its migration of Gentran to IBM Sterling B2B Integration for their massive EDI operations and also implemented Miracle's very own Supply Chain Visibility Portal on top of B2B SI for better visibility and control.
 
Miracle at WOW '16
 
 
 
IBMs World of Watson is back again, and is to be held from October 23rd to October 27th at Mandalay Bay, Las Vegas showcasing the stories and experiences of dynamic innovators who act as source of industry transformation. Miracle, a silver sponsor for the event is making its presence at the venue to guide customers with the inspiring sessions and demos on Cognitive, Cloud, IoT and Big Data.
